JobListing.JobFullDescription:
• Competitive Salary
  • Friendly working team environment
  • Opportunity for career progression


Stellar Recruitment are looking for ambitious, capable and energetic people with a good dose of common sense to join our team. We work hard to be the best, we give it our all and we take pride in what we do.

We are actively seeking a Leading Hand Carpenter to join with our client to commence work on a new commercial project, with an immediate start. It is essential that applicants for this role have previous experience in the commercial sector, and a proven record of quality workmanship behind them.

To be successful in this role you will have:
- 5+ years industry experience
- Proven ability to manage a team onsite
- To be confident reading & working from technical specifications & construction plans
- Hold a current Site Safe Certificate
- A clean full drivers licence (minimum of class 1)
- Your own reliable transport in order to get yourself to and from site
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Able to provide your own hand and power tools

Ideally we are looking for a highly health and safety aware, positive and hardworking attitude. We are prepared to wait for the right person for this role.

To apply for this role or for further information please contact Nicky at Stellar Workforce.
